## Description {#details}

This is an alternative analysis pass to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo">MachineBlockFrequencyInfo</a>.

The difference is that with this pass, the block frequencies are not computed when the analysis pass is executed but rather when the BFI result is explicitly requested by the analysis client.

This works by checking querying if MBFI is available and otherwise generating MBFI on the fly. In this case the passes required for (LI, DT) are also queried before being computed on the fly.

Note that it is expected that we wouldn&#39;t need this functionality for the new PM since with the new PM, analyses are executed on demand.

Definition at line 37 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/lazymachineblockfrequencyinfo-h">LazyMachineBlockFrequencyInfo.h</a>.

### releaseMemory() {#abec15b5785480ac593dfcab677af4c40}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void LazyMachineBlockFrequencyInfoPass::releaseMemory ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="#abec15b5785480ac593dfcab677af4c40">releaseMemory()</a> - This member can be implemented by a pass if it wants to be able to release its memory when it is no longer needed.

The default behavior of passes is to hold onto memory for the entire duration of their lifetime (which is the entire compile time). For pipelined passes, this is not a big deal because that memory gets recycled every time the pass is invoked on another program unit. For IP passes, it is more important to free memory when it is unused.

Optionally implement this function to release pass memory when it is no longer used.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/lazymachineblockfrequencyinfo-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/lazymachineblockfrequencyinfo-h">LazyMachineBlockFrequencyInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lazymachineblockfrequencyinfo-cpp/#l00046">46</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lazymachineblockfrequencyinfo-cpp">LazyMachineBlockFrequencyInfo.cpp</a>.
